pr_title: Change event from Normalization to Accession for PID creation

timeline.message: Change event from Normalization to Accession for PID creation

timeline.bodyText: This defines what we are migrating from, and we are migrating from boxc3 data which currently uses the Normalization event, so you'll need to leave it as NORMALIZATION in this case
timeline.author: bbpennel

timeline.bodyText: This defines what we are migrating from, and we are migrating from boxc3 data which currently uses the Normalization event, so you'll need to leave it as NORMALIZATION in this case. We would only need to change the event type as it is stored in boxc5
timeline.author: bbpennel

timeline.bodyText: Based on the previous comments, we don't have accession events in boxc3 so you shouldn't need this
timeline.author: bbpennel

timeline.bodyText: you'll need to undo the changes in here
